types1:Item.types1:Name: Process_AccountUpdate_WithTax
types1:Item.types1:Description: Creates or updates a Business Partner and Commercial Project in SAP when an Opportunity is Closed (Won) in VForce

process.name: Process_AccountUpdate_WithTax
process.description: Creates or updates a Business Partner and Commercial Project in SAP when an Opportunity is Closed (Won) in VForce

operation.expression: let $bp := $output.out_ProcessVariables_PATCH_A_BusinessPartner[1]/Code , $adr_cr := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_BusinessPartnerAddress[1]/Code , $adr_upd := $output.out_ProcessVariables_PATCH_BusinessPartnerAddress[1]/Code , $eml := $output.out_ProcessVariables_PATCH_BusinessPartnerEmailAddress[1]/Code , $phn_cr := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_BusinessPartnerPhoneNumber[1]/Code , $phn_upd := $output.out_ProcessVariables_PATCH_BusinessPartnerPhoneNumber[1]/Code , $web_cr := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_BusinessPartnerHomePageURL[1]/Code , $web_upd := $output.out_ProcessVariables_PATCH_BusinessPartnerHomePageURL[1]/Code , $cc_upd := $output.out_ProcessVariables_PATCH_CustomerCompanyType[1]/Code , $sa_upd := $output.out_ProcessVariables_PATCH_A_CustomerSalesArea[1]/Code return if ( ($temp.tmp_Flag_BP_ExistsInSAP = 0) ) then 'HTTP_404' else ( if ( (fn:number(replace($bp,'HTTP_','')) > 299) or (fn:number(replace(util:iif($temp.tmp_Flag_BP_AddressExists=1, $adr_upd, $adr_cr),'HTTP_','')) > 299) or (fn:number(replace($eml,'HTTP_','')) > 299) or (fn:number(replace(util:iif($temp.tmp_Flag_BP_PhoneNumberExists=1, $phn_upd, $phn_cr),'HTTP_','')) > 299) or (fn:number(replace(util:iif($temp.tmp_Flag_BP_HomePageURLExists=1, $web_upd, $web_cr),'HTTP_','')) > 299) or (fn:number(replace($cc_upd,'HTTP_','')) > 299) or (fn:number(replace($sa_upd,'HTTP_','')) > 299) ) then 'HTTP_400' else 'HTTP_200' )

let $bp := $output.out_ProcessVariables_PATCH_A_BusinessPartner[1]/Code , $adr_cr := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_BusinessPartnerAddress[1]/Code , $adr_upd := $output.out_ProcessVariables_PATCH_BusinessPartnerAddress[1]/Code , $eml := $output.out_ProcessVariables_PATCH_BusinessPartnerEmailAddress[1]/Code , $phn_cr := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_BusinessPartnerPhoneNumber[1]/Code , $phn_upd := $output.out_ProcessVariables_PATCH_BusinessPartnerPhoneNumber[1]/Code , $web_cr := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_BusinessPartnerHomePageURL[1]/Code , $web_upd := $output.out_ProcessVariables_PATCH_BusinessPartnerHomePageURL[1]/Code , $cc_upd := $output.out_ProcessVariables_PATCH_CustomerCompanyType[1]/Code , $sa_upd := $output.out_ProcessVariables_PATCH_A_CustomerSalesArea[1]/Code return if ( ($temp.tmp_Flag_BP_ExistsInSAP = 0) ) then 'BP not found in SAP' else ( if ( (fn:number(replace($bp,'HTTP_','')) > 299) or (fn:number(replace(util:iif($temp.tmp_Flag_BP_AddressExists=1, $adr_upd, $adr_cr),'HTTP_','')) > 299) or (fn:number(replace($eml,'HTTP_','')) > 299) or (fn:number(replace(util:iif($temp.tmp_Flag_BP_PhoneNumberExists=1, $phn_upd, $phn_cr),'HTTP_','')) > 299) or (fn:number(replace(util:iif($temp.tmp_Flag_BP_HomePageURLExists=1, $web_upd, $web_cr),'HTTP_','')) > 299) or (fn:number(replace($cc_upd,'HTTP_','')) > 299) or (fn:number(replace($sa_upd,'HTTP_','')) > 299) ) then 'Bad Request' else 'OK' )

let $bp := $output.out_ProcessVariables_PATCH_A_BusinessPartner[1]/Code , $adr_cr := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_BusinessPartnerAddress[1]/Code , $adr_upd := $output.out_ProcessVariables_PATCH_BusinessPartnerAddress[1]/Code , $eml := $output.out_ProcessVariables_PATCH_BusinessPartnerEmailAddress[1]/Code , $phn_cr := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_BusinessPartnerPhoneNumber[1]/Code , $phn_upd := $output.out_ProcessVariables_PATCH_BusinessPartnerPhoneNumber[1]/Code , $web_cr := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_BusinessPartnerHomePageURL[1]/Code , $web_upd := $output.out_ProcessVariables_PATCH_BusinessPartnerHomePageURL[1]/Code , $cc_upd := $output.out_ProcessVariables_PATCH_CustomerCompanyType[1]/Code , $sa_upd := $output.out_ProcessVariables_PATCH_A_CustomerSalesArea[1]/Code return if ( ($temp.tmp_Flag_BP_ExistsInSAP = 0) ) then 'BusinessPartner for Account ' || $input.in_AccountID || ' does not exist in SAP' else ( if ( (fn:number(replace($bp,'HTTP_','')) > 299) or (fn:number(replace(util:iif($temp.tmp_Flag_BP_AddressExists=1, $adr_upd, $adr_cr),'HTTP_','')) > 299) or (fn:number(replace($eml,'HTTP_','')) > 299) or (fn:number(replace(util:iif($temp.tmp_Flag_BP_PhoneNumberExists=1, $phn_upd, $phn_cr),'HTTP_','')) > 299) or (fn:number(replace(util:iif($temp.tmp_Flag_BP_HomePageURLExists=1, $web_upd, $web_cr),'HTTP_','')) > 299) or (fn:number(replace($cc_upd,'HTTP_','')) > 299) or (fn:number(replace($sa_upd,'HTTP_','')) > 299) ) then 'Error occurred in child process, see error stack' else '' )

parameter.name: in_Filter
parameter.expression: (if (fn:string-length($temp.tmp_VForce_Account.BPAccountID__c)>0) then "BusinessPartner eq '"||$temp.tmp_VForce_Account.BPAccountID__c ||"' or " else '') || (if (fn:string-length($temp.tmp_VForce_Account.Agresso_ID__c)>0) then "BusinessPartnerIDByExtSystem eq '"||$temp.tmp_VForce_Account.Agresso_ID__c ||"' or " else '') ||"BusinessPartnerIDByExtSystem eq '"||fn:upper-case($temp.tmp_VForce_Account.Id) ||"'"

operation.expression: (:let $Email := $output.out_BusinessPartnerExpanded[1]/d[1]/to_BusinessPartnerAddress[1]/results[1]/to_EmailAddress[1]/results[1]/EmailAddress/text() return if ( fn:string-length($Email)=0) then 0 else 1 :) util:iif(fn:string-length($output.out_BusinessPartnerExpanded[1]/d[1]/results[1]/to_BusinessPartnerAddress[1]/results[1]/to_EmailAddress[1]/results[1]/EmailAddress/text())>0 or fn:string-length($output.out_BusinessPartnerExpanded[1]/d[1]/results[1]/to_BusinessPartnerAddress[1]/results[1]/to_EmailAddress[1]/results[1]/AddressID/text())>0, 1, 0)

(:let $WebsiteURL := $output.out_BusinessPartnerExpanded[1]/d[1]/to_BusinessPartnerAddress[1]/results[1]/to_URLAddress[1]/results[1]/WebsiteURL/text() return if ( fn:string-length($WebsiteURL)=0) then 0 else 1 :) util:iif(fn:string-length($output.out_BusinessPartnerExpanded[1]/d[1]/results[1]/to_BusinessPartnerAddress[1]/results[1]/to_URLAddress[1]/results[1]/WebsiteURL/text())>0 or fn:string-length($output.out_BusinessPartnerExpanded[1]/d[1]/results[1]/to_BusinessPartnerAddress[1]/results[1]/to_URLAddress[1]/results[1]/AddressID/text())>0, 1, 0)

(:let $PhoneNumber := $output.out_BusinessPartnerExpanded[1]/d[1]/to_BusinessPartnerAddress[1]/results[1]/to_PhoneNumber[1]/results[1]/PhoneNumber/text() return if ( fn:string-length($PhoneNumber)=0) then 0 else 1 :) util:iif(fn:string-length($output.out_BusinessPartnerExpanded[1]/d[1]/results[1]/to_BusinessPartnerAddress[1]/results[1]/to_PhoneNumber[1]/results[1]/PhoneNumber/text())>0 or fn:string-length($output.out_BusinessPartnerExpanded[1]/d[1]/results[1]/to_BusinessPartnerAddress[1]/results[1]/to_PhoneNumber[1]/results[1]/AddressID/text())>0, 1, 0)

assignment.title: Prepare Payload for BP Customer Company UpdatePayloads

operation.expression: <root xmlns:m="urn:informatica:ae:xquery:json2xml:meta-data"> <Customer>{$output.out_BusinessPartner }</Customer> <YY1_Customer_Segment_cco>{switch (fn:substring($temp.tmp_CompanyCode_Current[1]/Value ,1,2)) case "GB" return "CCUKIE0100" case "SG" return "CCSGIE0200" case "US" return "CCUSIE0100" case "IN" return "ASINIE0200" default return ""}</YY1_Customer_Segment_cco> <!--ValueAdjustmentKey>Z1</ValueAdjustmentKey--> <PaymentTerms>{'NT'||$temp.tmp_VForce_Account.Payment_Term__c }</PaymentTerms> <AccountingClerkInternetAddress>{$temp.tmp_VForce_Account.Billing_Contact_Email__c}</AccountingClerkInternetAddress> <CashPlanningGroup>{if($temp.tmp_VForce_Account.BillingCountryCode!= fn:substring($temp.tmp_CompanyCode_Current[1]/Value ,1,2)) then ('E3') (:Foreign:) else('E2') (:Domestic:) }</CashPlanningGroup> </root>

<root xmlns:m="urn:informatica:ae:xquery:json2xml:meta-data"> <Customer>{$output.out_BusinessPartner }</Customer> <IncotermsClassification>{$temp.tmp_Default_IncotermsClassification }</IncotermsClassification> <IncotermsLocation1>{$temp.tmp_Default_IncotermsLocation1 }</IncotermsLocation1> <IncotermsVersion>{$temp.tmp_Default_IncotermsVersion }</IncotermsVersion> {if (fn:substring($temp.tmp_CompanyCode_Current[1]/Value ,1,2) = "IN") then ( for $TaxCat in ("JOIG", "JOSG", "JOCG", "JOUG", "JCOS", "JTC1") return <to_SalesAreaTax> <results m:isArray="true"> <SalesOrganization>{fn:substring($temp.tmp_CompanyCode_Current[1]/Value ,1,4)}</SalesOrganization> <DistributionChannel>{$temp.tmp_Default_DistributionChannel }</DistributionChannel> <Division>{$temp.tmp_Default_Division }</Division> <DepartureCountry>{fn:substring($temp.tmp_CompanyCode_Current[1]/Value ,1,2)}</DepartureCountry> <CustomerTaxCategory>{$TaxCat}</CustomerTaxCategory> <CustomerTaxClassification>{switch($temp.tmp_VForce_Account.SBQQ__TaxExempt__c ) case "Yes" return 0 case "No" return 1 default return ""}</CustomerTaxClassification> </results> </to_SalesAreaTax> ) else ( <to_SalesAreaTax> <results m:isArray="true"> <SalesOrganization>{fn:substring($temp.tmp_CompanyCode_Current[1]/Value ,1,4)}</SalesOrganization> <DistributionChannel>{$temp.tmp_Default_DistributionChannel }</DistributionChannel> <Division>{$temp.tmp_Default_Division }</Division> <DepartureCountry>{fn:substring($temp.tmp_CompanyCode_Current[1]/Value ,1,2)}</DepartureCountry> <CustomerTaxCategory>{switch (fn:substring($temp.tmp_CompanyCode_Current[1]/Value ,1,2)) case "GB" return "TTX1" case "SG" return "TTX1" case "US" return "UTXJ" default return ""}</CustomerTaxCategory> <CustomerTaxClassification>{switch($temp.tmp_VForce_Account.SBQQ__TaxExempt__c ) case "Yes" return 0 case "No" return 1 default return ""}</CustomerTaxClassification> </results> </to_SalesAreaTax> ) } <CustomerPaymentTerms>{'NT'||$temp.tmp_VForce_Account.Payment_Term__c }</CustomerPaymentTerms> <Currency>{$temp.tmp_VForce_Account.Currency__c }</Currency> </root>

<root xmlns:m="urn:informatica:ae:xquery:json2xml:meta-data">
{if (fn:substring($temp.tmp_CompanyCode_Current[1]/Value ,1,2) = "IN") then ( for $TaxCat in ("JOIG", "JOSG", "JOCG", "JOUG", "JCOS", "JTC1") return <to_SalesAreaTax> <results m:isArray="true"> <SalesOrganization>{fn:substring($temp.tmp_CompanyCode_Current[1]/Value ,1,4)}</SalesOrganization> <DistributionChannel>{$temp.tmp_Default_DistributionChannel }</DistributionChannel> <Division>{$temp.tmp_Default_Division }</Division> <DepartureCountry>{fn:substring($temp.tmp_CompanyCode_Current[1]/Value ,1,2)}</DepartureCountry> <CustomerTaxCategory>{$TaxCat}</CustomerTaxCategory> <CustomerTaxClassification>{switch($temp.tmp_VForce_Account.SBQQ__TaxExempt__c ) case "Yes" return 0 case "No" return 1 default return ""}</CustomerTaxClassification> </results> </to_SalesAreaTax> ) else ( <to_SalesAreaTax> <results m:isArray="true"> <SalesOrganization>{fn:substring($temp.tmp_CompanyCode_Current[1]/Value ,1,4)}</SalesOrganization> <DistributionChannel>{$temp.tmp_Default_DistributionChannel }</DistributionChannel> <Division>{$temp.tmp_Default_Division }</Division> <DepartureCountry>{fn:substring($temp.tmp_CompanyCode_Current[1]/Value ,1,2)}</DepartureCountry> <CustomerTaxCategory>{switch (fn:substring($temp.tmp_CompanyCode_Current[1]/Value ,1,2)) case "GB" return "TTX1" case "SG" return "TTX1" case "US" return "UTXJ" default return ""}</CustomerTaxCategory> <CustomerTaxClassification>{switch($temp.tmp_VForce_Account.SBQQ__TaxExempt__c ) case "Yes" return 0 case "No" return 1 default return ""}</CustomerTaxClassification> </results> </to_SalesAreaTax> ) }
</root>

assignment.title: Prepare Payload for BP SalesArea Tax Update
Assignment to Code, Error etc.
assignment.operation: BusinessPartner for AccountID {$input.in_AccountID} does not exist in SAP
BusinessPartner does not exist in SAP

assignment.title: Update BP ID in VForce Account
